title: SSG Taliyah Fanart

embed.description: SSG TALIYAH HYPE. I absolutely had to draw the new skin. Bless Crown. #LeagueOfLegends #taliyah

body:
https://twitter.com/UrbanKitsune/status/1012288747961044992

I spent a few hours working on this tonight and wanted to share ;w;"/
Super excited that Taliyah is finally getting a new skin (even if it is eSports related).

replies.body:
Oi.

Sorry to be "Asshole of the Day" here.

But the "Story, Art & Sound" Board is ****not**** the place for fan art.

The Community Guidelines have made this specific as well.

Please post something similar to this in "Concepts & Creations" next time.

My bad, I didn't even realize.
I usually don't share my art so I've never really needed to know what specific board to post it to, and I didn't check first.
Doesn't help that it's about 6AM and I haven't slept yet, ahah.
But thanks for the heads up. I doubt I'll post much more art if any in the future, but if I do I'll be sure to post it to the correct board.

> [{quoted}](name=TheUrbanKitsune,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IImlbxg0,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-28T11:18:26.060+0000)
>
> My bad, I didn't even realize.
> I usually don't share my art so I've never really needed to know what specific board to post it to, and I didn't check first.
> Doesn't help that it's about 6AM and I haven't slept yet, ahah.
> But thanks for the heads up. I doubt I'll post much more art if any in the future, but if I do I'll be sure to post it to the correct board.

Please post more (this is really cute!) but Warlord Rhinark is right that the [Concepts and Creations](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) board probably has the more eager and excited audience for player made art :D

Ahh, thank you ;w;
Again, sorry about the mix-up with which board I am supposed to post to.

Omg she's so cute!!!!  I'm always happy to see more Taliyah fanarts, there really aren't enough out there.  I am so hype for her new skin!!!! Seems like us Taliyah fans have been waiting forever for her to get a new skin!!!  


I also happen to have drawn a fanart of her new skin, i hope you'll enjoy it as much as i did for yours!

https://sheepundoodles.tumblr.com/post/175290439509/they-finally-announced-the-samsung-galaxy-team

AHHH! I was going through images of SSG Taliyah on google and saw this! It's absolutely adorable, even more awesome finding out who did it! <3

And yeah, I don't see a whole ton of Taliyah fanart like I do of other champs, but when I do find new Tali fanart it's always really good. I think there a lot of really talented Taliyah mains ahhhh~
